# labelFontSize

**Type Property**

The standard font size, in points, for labels.

## Declaration

```swift
class var labelFontSize: CGFloat { get }
```

## Getting System Font Information

- **buttonFontSize**: The standard font size, in points, for buttons.
- **smallSystemFontSize**: The size, in points, of the standard small system font.
- **systemFontSize**: The size, in points, of the standard system font.
